item.title: Multiple airports won't play DHS video blaming Democrats for shutdown
item.description: The partisan message in the video, featuring DHS Secretary Kristi Noem, goes against policies and regulations, some airports say.

item.title: Is it safe to fly during the government shutdown? Experts weigh in.
item.description: Despite delays at some airports caused by staff shortages, government officials and aviation experts say flying is safe.
